title: Dodge queue timers. FIX PLEASE
body:
This is stupid. Due to your client not working, I have to wait 15mins to queue up for a game. Fix your problems!!!

I queue up for a game, then I go to my internet and do my own thing. I have one monitor so I can't see the client in the background. 3 times it did not pop up as "accept the game" so it gave me a queue timer telling me I was dodging too many times!! What the hell is this. Fix your client!! I don't want to be waiting 15mins for a queue every game for your bug problems. Fix this and I expect some RP as compensation for me waiting so damn long for queues where your client was the problem!!!

replies.body:
Keep in mind that this updated client is still in its beta stage.

From [DevBlog](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/client-update/article/3a587e99-6c9b-437a-a03b-7a7ac2be4bf8):
> Before you grab the download, you should understand that this is a **beta**, which means we're still working out a few kinks. The updated client is still missing a few features (like spectator mode) that we'll be adding over the next few patches. It also doesn't yet have some of the flashy animations that we've been working on. We'll take a few patches to turn things on and make optimisations, so if you decide to upgrade now we'll need you to be patient with us while we work everything out.

You can switch back to the Legacy client using the button on the updated client login screen.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg
